name: Ropes - A Multiplayer game for Android
name_original: Ropes - A Multiplayer game for Android
description:
Hi, I am Tanim Sk, A passionate programmer, currently, I am working on game development with the Godot game engine.

Ropes is a multiplayer game for the android platform. Here maximum 2 players can play via LAN network.

After installing this game, type your name then  press done (name will be written to file so, you dont need to do this every time)

If you wanna host the game click on the host, you'll get an id (the last two segments of your IP ), then tell your opponent to join with that id.

The more you can click the power button, the better your chances of winning.

Happy rope pulling!

if download button doesn't work, click here
